category-def.name: lastnpe.org
category-def.label: lastnpe.org M2E plugin
category-def.description:
See https://github.com/lastnpe/eclipse-external-annotations-m2e-plugin
Allows to configure the path to external annotations for the Maven Dependencies and JRE containers. See http://help.eclipse.org/oxygen/topic/org.eclipse.jdt.doc.user/tasks/task-using_external_null_annotations.htm
